name: Waves - The Penguin Jet Ski Enthusiast
name_original: Waves - The Penguin Jet Ski Enthusiast
description:
The game is about an Imperial Penguin called waves. He has mastered the art of Jet Ski and loves to pull some bodacious moves off on the open water. He loves Waves and hence his totally tubular nickname.

Created for the Global Game Jam 2017 in 48hrs
